text:
London, UK, Red Badger red-badger.com Full time, onsite only, we will relocate from USA and Europe.

Red Badger is looking for a talented full stack developer with strong Node.js or Ruby. We are using React.js on most of our projects and run the london.react user group.

http://red-badger.com/about-us/join-us/software-engineer/

We build beautiful software with bleeding edge tech for great brands like Fortnum & Mason and Dow Jones.

We are lean, agile and like to do things properly.

Sound interesting? Get in touch- https://redbadger.workable.com/jobs/32624/candidates/new -----
